candidates.title: Release 0.11.0
candidates.body:
- Remove dep tokio-pipe (#156)
- Remove deprecated functions (#156)
- Replace `From<tokio::proces::Child*>`
with `TryFrom<tokio::proces::Child*>`, since the converison is falliable (#156)
- Remove `IntoRawFd` for `Child*` since the conversion is falliable (#156)

candidates.title: chore: release v0.10.6
candidates.body:
## 🤖 New release * `openssh`: 0.10.5 -> 0.10.6
Changelog

## [0.10.6](https://github.com/openssh-rust/openssh/compare/v0.10.5...v0.10.6) - 2024-08-10 ### Other - Remove dep tokio-pipe ([#155](https://github.com/openssh-rust/openssh/pull/155)) ([#156](https://github.com/openssh-rust/openssh/pull/156))

--- This PR was generated with [release-plz](https://github.com/MarcoIeni/release-plz/).

candidates.title: Remove dep tokio-pipe
candidates.body:
* Remove dep tokio-pipe
* Remove deprecated functions
* Replace `From<tokio::proces::Child*>` with `TryFrom<tokio::proces::Child*>`, since the converison is falliable.
* Remove `IntoRawFd` for `Child*` since the conversion is falliable.
* Optimize `TryFromChildIo<tokio::process::Child*> for Child*`
* Rm unused functions and imports in native_mux_impl/stdio
* Impl `AsFd` for `Child*`
* Rm deprecated `FromRawFd` for `Stdio`
* Rm unused field in variant `Stdio::Fd`
* Fix clippy lints
* Remove unnecessary `unsafe`
* Bump dep tokio to 1.36.0

candidates.title: Remove dep tokio-pipe
candidates.body:
also remove deprecated functions, and replace `From<tokio::proces::Child*>`
with `TryFrom<tokio::proces::Child*>`, since the converison is falliable.

Also remove `IntoRawFd` for `Child*` since the conversion is falliable.

candidates.title: chore: release v0.10.5
candidates.body:
## 🤖 New release * `openssh`: 0.10.4 -> 0.10.5
Changelog

## [0.10.5](https://github.com/openssh-rust/openssh/compare/v0.10.4...v0.10.5) - 2024-08-10 ### Other - Fix release-plz.yml - Add missing feature doc for `Session::new*` ([#153](https://github.com/openssh-rust/openssh/pull/153)) - Create release-plz.yml for auto-release ([#151](https://github.com/openssh-rust/openssh/pull/151)) The changelog for this crate is kept in the project's Rust documentation in the changelog module.

--- This PR was generated with [release-plz](https://github.com/MarcoIeni/release-plz/).

candidates.title: Drop MPL licensed dependency dirs-sys
candidates.body:
Dependabot updated `dirs` crate to version 5.0.0 here: https://github.com/openssh-rust/openssh/pull/114. Between versions 4.0 and 5.0 dirs crate included a small dependency with MPL license, there's several tickets to dirs crate about this issue closed as WONTFIX, you can find some relevant links here: https://github.com/harryfei/which-rs/pull/78

One possible solution is to pin `dirs` to some older version, but functionality used by `openssh` is simple enough to implement from scratch

candidates.title: Release openssh v0.10.1
candidates.body: Also fixed the release log for v0.10.0

labels.name: rust
labels.description: Pull requests that update Rust code

candidates.body:
Updates the requirements on [openssh-sftp-client](https://github.com/openssh-rust/openssh-sftp-client) to permit the latest version.
Release notes

Sourced from openssh-sftp-client's releases.

0.14.0

What's Changed

  • dep: Bump openssh from v0.9.9 to v0.10.0 (#106)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/openssh-rust/openssh-sftp-client/compare/0.13.10...0.14.0

Commits
  • 7e88f40 Release openssh-sftp-client v0.14.0 (#107)
  • 49000d6 Update openssh requirement from 0.9.9 to 0.10.0 (#106)
  • 195c77f Use Swatinem/rust-cache@v2 for caching (#105)
  • e9135a6 Release openssh-sftp-client v0.13.10 (#104)
  • c99a2fc Set tokio_compat_file_write_limit to 640K by default (#103)
  • 9f7243d Release openssh-sftp-client v0.13.9 (#102)
  • c60efdb Fix invalid response id after closing file in blocking context (#101)
  • 5f4799a Release openssh-sftp-client v0.13.8 (#99)
  • 27e99ba Fix Drop impl for OwnedHandle (#98)
  • 7ac96c1 Release openssh-sftp-client v0.13.7 (#97)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

chosen_pr.body:
* Remove dep tokio-pipe
* Remove deprecated functions
* Replace `From<tokio::proces::Child*>` with `TryFrom<tokio::proces::Child*>`, since the converison is falliable.
* Remove `IntoRawFd` for `Child*` since the conversion is falliable.
* Optimize `TryFromChildIo<tokio::process::Child*> for Child*`
* Rm unused functions and imports in native_mux_impl/stdio
* Impl `AsFd` for `Child*`
* Rm deprecated `FromRawFd` for `Stdio`
* Rm unused field in variant `Stdio::Fd`
* Fix clippy lints
* Remove unnecessary `unsafe`
* Bump dep tokio to 1.36.0
